type: Upgrade of the outlet lamps and installation of a community address system at the Willow Cree Healing Lodge
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
procurement_category: Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
description: This posting is the Phase Two of a two-phase solicitation process associated with upgrading the exterior lighting at the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Willow Cree Healing Lodge. The second phase is to invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project based on the specifications and drawings provided.
full_summary:
# Phase 2 - ITT - EV385-230648 - Willow Cree Healing Lodge Lighting Upgrade

## Synopsis

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) has made this tender announcement in regards to a contract award for the upgrading of the exterior lighting at the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) Willow Cree Healing Lodge.

## Tender Details
| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| Reference Number | WS3790183897-Doc3847824850 |
| Solicitation Number | WS3790183897 |
| Publication Date | January 29, 2023 |
| Tender Closing Date | March 7, 2023 - 2:00 PM (Eastern Time) |
| Expected Contract Start Date | February 15, 2023 |
| Expected Contract End Date | July 1, 2024 |

## Location
This project is to be completed at the CSC Willow Cree Healing Lodge, located at Duck Lake, Ontario, with deliveries of materials and equipment coordinated from various regions of Canada.

## Contracting Entity
*   The contracting entity will be the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC).
*   The end-user entity will be the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC).

## Specifications

The scope of work under this contract includes:
*   Upgrading the exterior lighting of the Willow Cree Healing Lodge, including the general site lighting, lighting for Building B05, and pathways to the South Sweat Lodge.
*   Installing a community address system.

## Method of Award

This project will be awarded through a competitive tender process, with the lowest price being the criteria for selection.

## Units of Measure
The project will be valued under the United Nations Standard Products and Services Code (UNSPSC) category 72000000 - Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services.

## Trade Agreements

This procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Accord de libre-échange canadien (ALEC)

## Tender Documents

Tender documents for this project are available on the PSPC’s Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

## Contact Information

For more information about this tender, please contact:

Alex Tikhonovitch
alex.tikhonovitch@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5
TEL: None
FAX: None
